name: salesforce_assistant
description: Your intelligent Salesforce assistant. Use this tool for ANY request about Salesforce data - searching records, viewing pipeline, creating tasks, updating deals, logging calls, or any CRM question. Just pass the user's natural language request and the assistant will figure out what to do.

request_body_schema.description: Send the user's natural language request to the Salesforce AI assistant

message.description: The user's request in natural language. Examples: 'Show me my pipeline', 'Find the Acme account', 'Update the Acme deal to Closed Won', 'Create a task to call John tomorrow', 'Log this call'.
